value.fullName: If the Agreement requires payment of the termination fee to accompany the Termination Notice, insert the following:
value.label: If the Agreement requires payment of the termination fee to accompany the Termination Notice, insert the following:

value.fullName: Enclosed is check number ___________, representing the termination fee required by Paragraph ____ of the Agreement.
value.label: Enclosed is check number ___________, representing the termination fee required by Paragraph ____ of the Agreement.

value.fullName: All fees associated with the termination of this Agreement set forth in Paragraph ___ will be processed through and paid in accordance with the regular payment of rent
value.label: All fees associated with the termination of this Agreement set forth in Paragraph ___ will be processed through and paid in accordance with the regular payment of rent
